title: Did the Red Cross steal donations in Texas, empowered by executive order from Obama-Ira?
subtitle: A viral video on Facebook contains false and unsubstantiated allegations about the work of the humanitarian organization in the aftermath of Hurricane Harvey.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, the Red Cross stole donated items from churches in Houston, Texas, and then sold some items and burned others, all under the protection of an executive order issued in 2012.
